tool.name: singledishms
tool.shortdescription: New single dish tool interface to process an MS

method.name: singledishms
method.description: This is used to construct a singledishms tool instance. The created instance is just like the default one ('sdms') but physically independent from it. This is useful when users want to create their own tool instance inside scripts/modules to avoid possible conflicts that may happen when using the default tool instance from various places.
method.example:
Manual tool construction is done this way:
ssd = casac.singledishms()

method.name: open
method.shortdescription: Open a new MeasurementSet for processing after closing current MeasurementSet
method.description: Close the current MeasurementSet and open a new MeasurementSet instead. The current state of sdms is retained, except for the data selection.

param.name: ms_name
param.description: New MeasurementSet to be processed

method.name: close
method.shortdescription: Close the sdms tool, with data written on disk, keeping sdms running for future use
method.description: This is used to close sdms tools. Note that the data is written to disk and detached from sdms tool. This is a synonym for done.

method.name: done
method.description: This is used to close and sdms tools. Note that the data is written to disk and detached from sdms tool. This is a synonym for close.
